meanings.definition: A nerve cell that is the basic building block of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Neurones help send messages in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study neurones to understand the brain better.
meanings.sent3: The neurones in the brain have a busy job!
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts raced like a network of neurones.
meanings.sent5: The neurones firing in his brain created a beautiful symphony of thoughts.

meanings.definition: The basic unit of the nervous system that transmits information through electrical and chemical signals.
meanings.sent1: Neurones carry signals from the brain to the body.
meanings.sent2: Learning about neurones helps us understand how we feel pain.
meanings.sent3: The neurones in the body are like messengers delivering important news.
meanings.sent4: His ideas sparked between neurones like lightning bolts.
meanings.sent5: The neurones buzzed with excitement as the message traveled through them.

meanings.definition: A specialized cell that processes and transmits information in the brain and spinal cord.
meanings.sent1: Neurones in the spinal cord help us move our legs.
meanings.sent2: The brain neurones work together to form memories.
meanings.sent3: The neurones in the brain have a lot to chat about!
meanings.sent4: Her neurones danced with joy when she solved the puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The neurones whispered secrets to each other in the quiet of the night.
